extendedInfo.description: EventPilotÂ® conference app is your full featured guide to manage your conference attendance.   App features include:   â¢ Native app: No wifi connection required to access the conference program, schedule or animated maps.   â¢ Now: Stay informed about hot issues, event program changes, your upcoming sessions and organizer messages.   â¢ Program: Browse the entire event program to build your personal schedule, bookmark sessions or speakers, or access session handouts as available.    â¢ Take notes and email them as part of your trip report for reference.    â¢ Exhibitors, Maps, related conference info and much more.â¢ Schedule Sync: Use your web login in the Schedule Tab to download and view your schedule that you've created in the Meeting Planner online. Once you have downloaded your schedule, changes made in your app will upload to the Meeting Planner. To avoid overwriting schedule changes, use only one device with the app running at a time. Use the Settings tab to login in to Meeting Planner if you canceled out of the initial login prompt.

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: Just keep making it work better. Also need to work on showing concurrent data in calendar. There has to be other visualization tricks to try. e.g. Use the map to show clusters of posters and color code by time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not usable
reviews.comment: Glad it finally works for nexus tablet. But the calendar is not usable. The problem is that there usually way too many concurrent events to display when each hour is only allowed one line and all the events must fit in that single line.   An alternative is to display events by type, show all  the symposium for the day, followed by posters. And sort the posters by time or by poster board number. Allow deleting events and taking notes.   Color coding by theme is not useful. By event type will be better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good idea, but not very useful
reviews.comment: needs improvement. it synced nicely with the posters I wanted to see, but somehow, several other posters were added to my calendar and cluttered it up. I would like to see the ability to add notes under any given poster (more useful for the tablet app than the phone.)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working on galaxy nexus
reviews.comment: App keeps returning to the initial startup screens when I try to navigate to anything on the \"home\" screen. I can\'t even open the day\'s schedule without the app displaying the startup screen multiple times. Not a stable app, I\'d say.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too many events
reviews.comment: It refuses to display the posters I want to see... didn\'t a real neuroscientist beta test this app before release?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes on opening
reviews.comment: This won\'t even open on my phone without crashing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 80% there
reviews.comment: The app was usable, but some details need to be worked out. It would be helpful if the morning and afternoon sessions were separate in the browse by session screen. Keep improving it and soon everyone will be using it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible app
reviews.comment: Slow, buggy, bad UI. SfN should demand its money back from the developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy on DroidX
reviews.comment: I\'ve never seen an app that crashed this frequently before. Too bad, looks pretty useful otherwise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Functional but annoying
reviews.comment: The data is there. And it is correct. But the ux was woefully inadequate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shame but not up to scratch
reviews.comment: Quite simply it doesnt give me my chosen itinerary in the scheduler. Some posters.missing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bringing SFN into the 21st century
reviews.comment: I love this concept! I recommend spending some time with app before the conference to get oriented, but I think I will be able to just bring my smartphone to the conference center this year! No more carrying a bag full of programs and note pads.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can run on Jelly Bean
reviews.comment: I exported from a Froyo phone phone with \"MyAppSharer\", copied \"com. eventpilot. sfn12. apk\" to my Nexus 7 via Dropbox , and installed it.  Be sure to enable \"unknown  sources\" under \"security\".  Running fine so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can we synchronize the app with Oasis itinerary?
reviews.comment: If we could synchronize the app with the itinerary that I made on Oasis that would be good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Search needs work
reviews.comment: Just downloaded it and tried to find one of my 3 abstracts. With neither authors, keywords, or both could I find them. Also, the  back key should take you to the previous screen, not exit the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Adds events by itself
reviews.comment: App has added many,many events i did not select!
reviews.author: A Google User
